attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This proposal is for the consideration of a knighthood for the six creators of Monty Python, namely -

John Cleese
Michael Palin
Terry Jones
Graham Chapman
Eric Idle
Terry Gilliam

We have the knighthoods of people such as Mick Jagger and Alex Ferguson for music and football, so why shouldn't the Pythons be knighted for services to humour, or comedy? Their films are world reknowned, and they have influenced comedians for many years.

This petition is no joke, and I feel the Pythons should genuinely recieve a knighthood - I'm sure the british publi will agree.
